__e: You're doing very valuable work, and I hate it because it means that you're not coming back.
Look, you can think what you like about I.A... or about me, for that matter, but don't you dare try to pretend that what I do is anything less than good difficult police work.
If my schmoops says he can't swim, then he must have a legitimate reason, and I fully support him.
But believe it or not, I had a really good reason for doing what I did.
And none of those things are reason enough to not be with the person that you love, especially when there just isn't enough.
You better have something substantial for him. He's traveled a long way for this.
Isn't there only one good reason why you missed the sign?
I really don't know, but if he did, it would give him a clear motive for killing Michael.
Do you think you need a valid reason to run away or can you do it just to test yourself ?
Bear in mind, if your boss did decide to out Bobby, it's possible he did so for a very good reason.
